name: Summer Tomato Risotto with Saffron
description: A summery Tomato Risotto highlighting juicy, sweet, vine-ripened tomatoes, and infused with saffron.  Serve this as a vegetarian main, seasonal side dish, or top it off with smoky,  pan-seared shrimp. Vegetarian-adaptable! On a cool afternoon or any afternoon, take thee to the woods. There is a spirit there, ancient, waiting to soothe your soul. We call it time. ~D.M. Jenkins Is there anything better than summer's sweet and juicy tomatoes, picked right off the vine? I look forward to them every year, never tiring of their goodness. Here they are blistered in a pan before going into a flavorful saffron-infused
